bibl.title: Albert Rhude v. A.P. Hotaling Company of Puget Sound. Copy of Warrant.
bibl.note: Our transcription is based on a digital image of the microfilmed original.

person.persName: A.P. Hotaling Company of Puget Sound

div1.ab: In the District Court holding terms at Seattle in King County Washington Territory.
The A.P. Hotaling Company (of Puget Sound) Plaintiff vs Albert Rhude Defendant | Warrant of arrest.
To the sheriff of King County Greeting:
div1.p:
Whereas an action has been committed in the above entitled court against the above named defendant by the above named plaintiff, and whereas an order has been made therein by the Judge of the above entitled court requiring that the above named defendant be arrested and heed to bail in the sum of one thousand dollars, and the necesary affivavits and bond have been filed therein as required by law now therefore you are hereby commanded
to take the body of and defendant if he be bound in your county and to keep him safely in your custody until beshaw give the aforesaid bail or be otherwise discharged according to law.
Witness this Honorable Roger S. Greene Judge of said Court and the seal thereof this 8th day of November A.D. 1884
div1.ab: James Seavey Clerk By James P Ludlow Deputy
4184 In the District Ct holding terms at Seattle
A.P. Hotaling Co. vs Albert Rhude (Copy) Warrant
Filed Nov 10 1884 James Seavey Clerk. By James P Ludlow Deputy Clerk. Bunkers Rasin Ptffs Atty
